FuncDef:
The ssl-policy command configures an SSL policy for the gRPC IPv6 service.
The undo ssl-policy command deletes an SSL policy of the gRPC IPv6 service. The ssl-policy command configures an SSL policy for the gRPC IPv6 service. The undo ssl-policy command deletes an SSL policy of the gRPC IPv6 service. By default, no SSL policy is configured for the gRPC IPv6 service.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an SSL policy. The value must be the name of an existing SSL policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 23 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: If a collector functioning as a client initiates a connection to a device functioning as a server, the data sampled is dynamically subscribed to. In this case, you can configure an SSL policy for the gRPC IPv6 service. This ensures that a secure SSL connection can be established between the server and client.
